ygData.msgSnippet: Verant is doing this because they don t want trade skills to be profitable selling to npc s. What, then, do we do with trade skills that have no benefit to
ygData.messageBody:
Verant is doing this because they don't want trade skills to be profitable selling to npc's. What, then, do we do with trade skills that have no benefit to pc's? 2 very good examples would be brewing and pottery. Brewing was nerfed about 2 weeks ago, and now pottery. Both trade skills used to be profitable selling to npc's, but they both served NO purpose to other players. Now that you can't make money on either trade skill, I'm hoping people will boycott the skills, /feedback to Verant, anything they can to make these skills useful. They either need to make it profitable again, or make the products of the skills useful to other players. If other players actually wanted to buy brews and pottery things, they would be profitable, and it would fit Verant's wish that you can't make money selling to npc's. But until then brewing and pottery are the biggest waste of time in the game.

Tanthalias
Half Elven Bard
Tarew Marr
